description:
Are you trying to find a super simple, step-by-step guide to creating a podcast on iTunes?

This “Definitive Guide To Creating A Podcast On iTunes” will give you…

  • A stress-free and geek-free process to follow. There is no technical terms that will make your brain go fuzzy
  • Step-by-step process to follow means you will make no errors. Do it once and do it right saves you precious time. Follow the lectures and you cannot go wrong
  • Included tips and techniques on how to make your podcast sound the best it possibly can, so your listeners get an amazing experience and tell their friends about how awesome you are!
  • You will always have the videos on hand just in case you need to refresh the process in your mind. The lecture on uploading to Amazon S3 gives you the knowledge for you to use Amazon S3 for ANY of your business needs, not just podcasting. This is valuable knowledge to have.
  • You will be up and running with your podcast on iTunes in only 62 minutes from now! (that's how long the total length of videos are...)
title: How To Create A Podcast On iTunes
